snippet.title: Facebook API Privacy Policy
snippet.description: * Facebook API Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions: Healthline will collect information from users via Facebook’s application solely for the purpose of creating a better user experience on the application. snippet.title: Facebook "Likes" Reveal Your Political Views, Sexual Orientation, Drug Use, and More
snippet.description: * Facebook "Likes" Reveal Your Political Views, Sexual Orientation, Drug Use, and More An individual's Facebook "Likes" can be used to quickly and easily create an entire demographic profile, but at what cost?

snippet.title: Doctors on Facebook Should ‘Pause Before Posting’
snippet.description: * Doctors on Facebook Should ‘Pause Before Posting’ Doctors' groups provide guidelines for how doctors should behave online and offer a commonsense approach to social media.

snippet.title: Facebooking As a Family
